title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
description: When I view the report design, I noticed that the property 'fileName' is storing an absolute path. It would be more convenient if it saved the relative path instead. Here are the specific details:
EB: The property element <property name='fileName' value='../otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary'/> should store the relative path.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the report design. 
2. Check the value of the 'fileName' property in the property element. 
3. Verify that it is storing an absolute path instead of a relative path. 

Expected result: 
- The 'fileName' property should store a relative path. For example: <property name='fileName' value='../otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary'/>
